name: American Cancer Society: Discovery Shop (Menlo Park)
description: Thrift store accepting donations; proceeds support cancer research and patient programs
fullDescription: The American Cancer Society Discovery Shop in Menlo Park is a thrift store selling quality secondhand and vintage items, with proceeds supporting cancer research and patient programs. Military receive 10% off any day; seniors 55+ receive 10% off on Tuesdays.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing donations
- Accept accessories and housewares
- Accept linens and furniture
- Accept collectibles and vintage items
- Affordable thrift shopping
- Proceeds fund cancer research
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the Discovery Shop at 748 Santa Cruz Ave, Menlo Park
2. Donate gently used items
3. Or shop for affordable goods
4. Open Mon-Sat 10am-6pm, Sun 10am-5pm
5. Call (650) 325-8939 for info
address: 748 Santa Cruz Ave, Menlo Park, CA 94025
keywords: ACS, American Cancer Society, Discovery Shop, Menlo Park, thrift store, donate clothes, secondhand, vintage, charity shop, clothing donation, furniture donation, military discount, senior discount
